articles.title: Meghan Markle Skipping Charles' Coronation Is 'Brilliant,' Experts Say - Insider
articles.description: Buckingham Palace confirmed that Prince Harry will be attending King Charles' coronation, but Meghan Markle will be noticeably absent.
articles.content:
Less than a month until King Charles' coronation, Meghan Markle and Prince Harry finally gave an answer to the much-anticipated question of whether they are attending. The answer? Kind of.
